Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 60h Indiana.
ShortDescription: Westbound 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near 60th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Indiana, 59th including the normal route streets  due to street blockage near 60th/Indiana.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Rosemont due to mechanical problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Rosemont due to mechanical problems.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
